pullrequest.title: Added boolean, pass by reference value GetParam to PhysicsEngine

content.raw: Indeed. `PhysicsEngine` has many elements that are shared between physics engines. In this pull request or in the future, `PhysicsEngine` should be refactored to also include  `SetParam` for these elements, and each physics engine should inherit the corresponding member variables for these elements. This is true for most shared physics elements, except for max_contacts, gravity, and magnetic field.
content.html: Indeed. PhysicsEngine has many elements that are shared between physics engines. In this pull request or in the future, PhysicsEngine should be refactored to also include SetParam for these elements, and each physics engine should inherit the corresponding member variables for these elements. This is true for most shared physics elements, except for max_contacts, gravity, and magnetic field.
